text: Hi all!  A few months ago I decided to implement a numbers-to-words converter in Julia: <https://github.com/jakewilliami/SpelledOut.jl|https://github.com/jakewilliami/SpelledOut.jl>.  If anyone who knows more than one language wants to contribute to this, I think that would be awesome, as currently it only deals with English! :)
